import urllib.request, json, ssl

ctx = ssl.create_default_context\(\)
API_KEY = ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiI4ZjkzZWVhYS1lZWQ5LTRlMDYtOWMxOC1mNmFjYThmZjA3YjMiLCJpc3MiOiJuOG4iLCJhdWQiOiJwdWJsaWMtYXBpIiwiaWF0IjoxNzcwOTI5NzMzLCJleHAiOjE3NzM1MDQwMDB9.ii-Qih5OEXeIaXwIeTfk4rUwoaegEk0-zppAnHfHShg''
BASE = ''https://solarexpresss.app.n8n.cloud''

# Check the SUCCESSFUL E2E test executions \(earlier today\) 
req = urllib.request.Request\(
    f''{BASE}/api/v1/executions?workflowId=BEOQVaIituRIqug9&limit=30'',
    headers={''X-N8N-API-KEY'': API_KEY}
\)
resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req, context=ctx\)
execs = json.loads\(resp.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)

# Find executions with status not ''error'' or find the E2E test ones
for ex in execs.get\(''data'', []\):
    ex_id = ex[''id'']
    t = ex.get\(''startedAt'', ''?''\)[:19]
    s = ex.get\(''status'', ''?''\)
    
    # Get detail for this execution
    req2 = urllib.request.Request\(
        f''{BASE}/api/v1/executions/{ex_id}?includeData=true'',
        headers={''X-N8N-API-KEY'': API_KEY}
    \)
    resp2 = urllib.request.urlopen\(req2, context=ctx\)
    detail = json.loads\(resp2.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)
    
    run_data = detail.get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''resultData'', {}\).get\(''runData'', {}\)
    
    # Check if any code node succeeded \(Extract Field Parameters, Evaluate Disqualifier, Evaluate Hot Lead\)
    for code_node in [''Extract Field Parameters'', ''Evaluate Disqualifier Rules'', ''Evaluate Hot Lead'']:
        if code_node in run_data:
            node_runs = run_data[code_node]
            if isinstance\(node_runs, list\) and node_runs:
                status = node_runs[0].get\(''executionStatus'', ''?''\)
                if status == ''success'':
                    print\(f''Exec #{ex_id} \({t}\) - {code_node} SUCCEEDED''\)
                    # Show what data it output
                    output = node_runs[0].get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''main'', [[]]\)[0]
                    if output:
                        item = output[0] if isinstance\(output, list\) else output
                        print\(f''  Output: {json.dumps\(item.get\(""json"", {}\)\)[:200]}''\)
                    print\(\)
")
